page.title: 10Restaurants in Dedham
page.content: The Essex Rose Tea House is a licensed restaurant in a building dated 1500 in High Street. It is owned by Dell Bower who runs it with his wife, daughter and several local helpers. Coffees and lunches are served and specialities are cream teas and home made scones and cakes made daily by the owner. They also sell souvenirs of Constable Country, home made chocolates and gifts. People come from all over the world to Constable Country and many visit the Essex Rose, which is one of the good local restaurants mentioned in many leading guide books. Others are The Mallard, the Talbooth, Dedham Vale Terrace Restaurant and The Marlbourgh Head. There is also The Sun Hotel and the Wholefood Restaurant at the Art Centre.
